details: A C programming course covers the fundamentals of the C programming language, including data types, control structures, and memory management, in order to prepare students for software development and system programming jobs

An Introduction to Algorithms course provides students with a fundamental grasp of algorithm design and analysis, preparing them to solve difficult problems efficiently and optimize computational activities

An Introduction to C++ for DSA course focuses on how to use the C++ programming language to implement and manipulate various data structures and algorithms, allowing students to create efficient solutions for real-world computational challengesactivities

A Basic Data Structures course introduces students to fundamental concepts such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, providing students with the necessary building blocks for efficiently organizing and handling data programming applications

An Introduction to OOP in Python course teaches students the principles of OOP using Python as the programming language, allowing them to create modular, reusable, and maintainable code by using classes and objects

A Software Engineering course teaches students the methodical design, development, testing, and maintenance of software systems, with an emphasis on industry best practices, project management, and teamwork

AWS is a leading cloud computing platform that provides a variety of cloud services such as processing power, storage, databases, machine learning, and more. Through cloud-based solutions, it enables enterprises to scale resources, decrease infrastructure costs

MySQL is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) that is widely used for storing, managing, and retrieving structured data. Its dependability, speed, and scalability make it a popular choice for a wide range of applications

Problem-solving comprises examining problems, developing solutions, and putting them into action, so fostering effective decision-making and generating successful outcomes. Critical thinking and creativity are required for effective problem-solving
